p: Plant biotechnology is a promising platform for exploring the unlimited potential of many diverse medicinal plants. Unfortunately, pandemics like COVID-19 are likely to occur again on a smaller or larger scale due to the array of known and unknown pathogens out there. Plant biotechnology tools and methods such as in vitro culture technology is an asset at our disposal to harness the diversity of secondary metabolites produced by different plants. In vitro culture technologies can potentially grow any plant anywhere and offer the added value of overproduction of plant cultures, enhanced production of secondary metabolites, and the generation of novel medicinal compounds.
